title: Altrincham
name: Timperley Sports Club
directions: Off A560 to east of town
content: "One of the oldest private sports clubs in the UK (founded in 1877) that incorporates Timperley Cricket Club, Hockey Club and Lacrosse Club. We are proud of our excellent facilities enjoyed by our 700 members including a brand new purpose built clubhouse, two artificial turf pitches and two cricket pitches on site."
